main.name: Swaroop Chakraborty
main.short_description: I believe in code for good and code for food policy.
main.bio:
Hi there! I am Swaroop! You might also know me as Ayan Chax. I have been into freelancing consulting, coding and full stack development since more than 10 years now. I tend to build scalable mobile ready applications that are interesting for the world and which are essentially useful and helpful to a large section of the community. As a coder, I strongly believe in code for good and code for food policy. I'm a positive team player and an enthusiastic soul at tandem. I have the ability to lead and manage a team to do something brilliantly creative everyday.

Silchar is my hometown and I'm a Bengali(a.k.a Bong) by origin who likes it more when people call me by my pet name, Ayan. I enjoy listening to music, reading books and have an unconditional love for cheese burst pizzas.

Feluda by Satyajit Ray stands top in my all time favorite list when it comes to entertainment. I am a short story writer apart from a curious engineer at work. You may visit the blogs section to read few collection of my short stories.

work.description:
As a Consultant at TCS, I play a pivotal role in overseeing the end-to-end project development lifecycle while leading a dynamic team of 20 professionals. Specializing in a Data Annotation Product Platform, I lead my team through the intricate landscape of niche technologies, including various AI and ML tools (Sagemaker, Xtreme1), Angular Python, Node.js, and AWS.

 My responsibilities extend beyond mere supervision, delving into architecture design for both front-end and back-end components.

 Within the realm of project management, my role encompasses orchestrating stand-up calls, diligently collecting updates from team members, and ensuring seamless communication channels. This multi-faceted engagement ensures that our projects adhere to strict delivery timelines. The scope of my duties further extends into various levels of testing, where I contribute to the quality assurance process to guarantee the reliability and functionality of our solutions.
